title: On-Site Learning Tour - 7 Air Street
desc: 7 Air Street, is the first listed building and the highest office building to receive a BREEAM 2011 outstanding rating.  The recently completed 46,000 ft 2 ?office building has set a new gold standard in the UK for sustainability in a regenerated historic building . This complex project in the heart of London is part of The Crown Estate?s Quadrant development at the southern end of Regent Street. 7 Air Street benefits from cutting edge fuel cell technology and is powered by the largest and most efficient fuel cell in Europe.? 7 Air Street also provides an important stepping stone, contributing to the to The Crown Estate?s ecology masterplan, which forms part ofWild West End, seeking to create a green corridor between Regent?s Park and St James?s Park. Come and hear from the project team directly about the project strategy, the challenges and opportunities faced and the lessons learned from this highly sustainable project.
